glsa.title: Cscope: Many buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: Cscope is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows that could lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Cscope is a developer's tool for browsing source code.

description.p: Cscope does not verify the length of file names sourced in #include statements.

impact.p: A user could be enticed to source a carefully crafted file which will allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code with the permissions of the user running Cscope.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Cscope users should upgrade to the latest version:
